scripts.postbuild: if [ -d '../collective.solr' ]; then npm run integrate; fi
scripts.integrate: cp dist/bundle.js ../collective.solr/src/collective/solr/static/dist/search.min.js && cp src/index.html ../collective.solr/src/collective/solr/static/src/. && cp src/index.jsx ../collective.solr/src/collective/solr/static/src/. && cp package.json ../collective.solr/src/collective/solr/static/. && cp webpack.config.js ../collective.solr/src/collective/solr/static/.
